data.body: you should be able to merge beads when only two are selected - the user should be prompted to pick the "survivor".  The labels, description, and notes of the non-survivor are APPENDED to the survivor's.  The survivor's title, type, priority, and dependencies remain unchanged.

data.title: bulk action: merge beads
